1. Identify unpaid order from 'DROPSHIP REPORT' email.
2. Research: Why did supplier ship without approval? Can we get a credit memo? Do we need to pay?.
3. Create new SO using original info; ensure MFR includes 3rd party supplier (e.g., MOLEX_WAL).
4. Update Resale to $0.00 (Prevents credit need).
5. Remove all Freight charges.
6. Book SO and place on manual header hold: 'Replacement SO; reaching out to [SUPPLIER NAME] for PO Cancellation'.
Rationale: Required when AP cannot pay third-party suppliers on the original order.
